ClassDesc: Adapt a SAX2 XMLReader as a SAX1 Parser. This class wraps a SAX2 @B_org#xml#sax#XMLReader_E@ and makes it act as a SAX1 @B_org#xml#sax#Parser_E@. The XMLReader must support a true value for the http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes property or parsing will fail with a @B_org#xml#sax#SAXException_E@; if the XMLReader supports a false value for the http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces property, that will also be used to improve efficiency.
